explanation: [0-0] A yellow square character with red hair stands at one end of a conveyor belt, holding a bowl of bubble tea. At the other end stands another yellow square character without hair, staring at the bubble tea. The background is a cluster of green trees.

[0-7] The red-haired yellow square character places the bowl of bubble tea on a table to the side. Then, an empty bowl comes down the conveyor belt and stops under a blue pipe. Bubble tea from the pipe then pours into the bowl. The scene cuts to the hairless yellow square character lying on the conveyor belt, eyes darting around. He is then transported to under the blue pipe, while the red-haired yellow square character sets another full bowl of bubble tea aside and stares at him. Subsequently, the hairless character opens his mouth wide, and the bubble tea flows from the pipe into his mouth. He closes his mouth, seemingly satisfied.

[7-14] The camera then pans right, showing a rabbit, a chicken, and a yellow square character with black hair each standing on a stool. In the middle is a large bucket full of bubble tea, connected to a blue pipe. The rabbit excretes tapioca pearls into the bucket, while the chicken excretes milk tea. The black-haired character then flips a red switch, and the bubble tea is sucked up the pipe. Finally, the scene cuts back to the hairless yellow square character, who witnesses this sight and opens his mouth wide, filled with pearls and milk tea.
